import React, { useState } from 'react' import './App.css' import { TableLine, DoneIcon, UndoneIcon, TrashIcon, PencilIcon, TableContentBox, DoneTextContainer, TextContainer, ListContainer, Header, SearchContainer, Container, InputLine, ContentBox, SearchBar, Table, } from './elements' function App() { const [items, setItems] = useState([ { id: 1, done: true, text: 'Get up early' }, { id: 2, done: true, text: 'Do some meditation' }, { id: 3, done: false, text: 'Eat a healthy breakfast' }, { id: 4, done: false, text: 'Drink plenty of water' }, { id: 5, done: false, text: 'Exercise' }, { id: 6, done: false, text: 'Have fun' }, ]) const trashHandler = (id) => { const newItems = [...items] const itemIndex = newItems.findIndex((item) => item.id === id) newItems.splice(itemIndex, 1) setItems(newItems) } const tickHandler = (id) => { const newItems = [...items] const itemIndex = newItems.findIndex((item) => item.id === id) newItems[itemIndex].done = !newItems[itemIndex].done setItems(newItems) } const inputHandler = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value) console.log(items.length) const newItem = { id: items.length + 1, done: false, text: e.target.value, } const newItems = [...items, newItem] // const itemIndex = newItems.findIndex((item) => item.id === id) // newItems[itemIndex].done = !newItems[itemIndex].done setItems(newItems) } const listItem = ({ id, done, text }) => ( tickHandler(id)}> {done ? : } {done ? ( {text} ) : ( {text} )} trashHandler(id)} /> ) return (
REACT TO-DO
inputHandler(e)} />
{items.map((item) => listItem(item))}
 Clear all
) } export default App
